text: Avangard () is a rural locality (a village) in Tavtimanovsky Rural Settlement of Iglinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 67 . There is 1 street. == Geography == The village is located 26 km from Iglino and 8 km from Tavtimanovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Iglinsky District
title: Avangard, Iglinsky District, Bashkortostan
